title: Histoire(s) du Cinéma 4b: The Signs Among Us
original_title: Histoire(s) du cinéma 4b : les signes parmi nous
overview: Part 8 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century.
synopsis: Part 8 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century.
